name: Bug attack (itch) (Vopaman, Dufig, Vroubek)
description:
We all started gemedev at start of this year, so please don't hate us for some glitches and/or bugs, but some feedback will be good for our future projects 

ENJOY 

In this game you play as a farmer trying to grow your flower. But evil bugs want to eat it so you have to defend it. By killing the bugs you can get flowers the bugs stole. You can put those flowers in a fertilizer maker and when you get 3 of them, you can make fertilizer. You can carry the fertilizer to magic flower and make it grow. When it gets enugh fertilizer, it will let out scent bugs hate and you complete the level.

controls:
attack with left click

carry and aplly items with middle click

interact with rightclick

move with WSAD or arrow keys
